sqlMap.select:
select CUSTOM_FIELD_ID, FIELD_NAME as CUS_FLD_FIELD_NAME, FIELD_VALUE as CUS_FLD_FIELD_VALUE, ENTITY_TYPE, ENTITY_ID, SEQUENCE_NUM from CUSTOM_FIELD where ENTITY_ID = #entityId# and ENTITY_TYPE = #entityType#
and #asOfDate# between START_DATE and END_DATE
order by FIELD_NAME asc, SEQUENCE_NUM asc
sqlMap.insert:
insert into CUSTOM_FIELD (FIELD_NAME, FIELD_VALUE, ENTITY_TYPE, ENTITY_ID, SEQUENCE_NUM) values (#fieldName#, #fieldValue#, #entityType#, #entityId#, #sequenceNum#)
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS value
sqlMap.delete:
delete from CUSTOM_FIELD where ENTITY_TYPE = #entityType# and ENTITY_ID = #entityId#
and FIELD_NAME = #fieldName#
